intro.title: Field Notes
intro.description: Every component is tracked from source to finishing. We collaborate with family-owned workshops in Colombo and Matara to keep the making close to our studio.

materials.title: Sterling Silver .925
materials.description: Primary alloy sourced from recycled electronics through a Colombo partner foundry. Refined to .925 purity before casting.
details: Hallmarked per Sri Lankan Bureau of Standards

materials.title: 14K Gold Vermeil
materials.description: A thick 2.5 micron gold layer deposited over sterling silver. Electroplated in micro-batches to reduce waste.

materials.title: Stone & Organics
materials.description: Locally sourced quartz, coconut-shell bead cores, and ethically certified pearls from Puttalam lagoon fisheries.

finishing.title: Finishing Lab
finishing.description: Tumbling media is reused until neutralized. Oxidized finishes employ liver of sulfur diluted to food-grade standards and neutralized before disposal.
